Terrorsaur:




Terrorsaur backed up a few paces, watching Dinotron. He weived from 
his optic lazers, but one beam hit his leg. He screamed shrilly and 
righted himself. 

Another one of the maximals appeared. He flew to the left loosly, 
almost loosing his balance. He was damaged in the first place. While 
trying to right himself, he fired his optic lazers at the two 
Maximals' fronts.
